page.description: Deletes a directory in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A javascript function to call if deleting the directory succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function to call if an error occurs when trying to delete the directory.

argument.name: flagRecursive
argument.description: A true or false value. If true, the files and sub-directories contained in the specified directory are also deleted.

page.discussion: The phoneGapRemoveDirectory method deletes a directory in the file system of the mobile device. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onComplete function if the method succeeded. Calls the onError function is the method failed.
